name: SoftConsultGroup
tagline: Focused on providing high quality IT services.
description:
SoftConsultGroup Ltd is a privately owned company. Established in 2001, we have gained huge software development experience. Our development center is in Sofia, Bulgaria. Being an EU member state, we have the benefit of stable legislation combined with strategic geographic location.
We are focused on providing high quality IT services. We do software development, software quality assurance and software support.
